markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Girtablilu Seer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1171)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The highest position of authority in a girtablilu community is the group's religious leader. This sacred duty requires years of study, meditation, and dedication to awaken a mystical font of divine magic within the girtablilu. These seers ensure that every action taken by the community falls in line with even the most obscure dogma of their tradition, and they don't hesitate to turn their fury on members of their own community who violate their mandates.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Girtablilu Seer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1171)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 112</row>

**Perception** +25; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Girtablilu](/Languages.aspx?ID=64)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +24, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +23, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +25, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +5

**Con** +6

**Int** +3

**Wis** +7

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +25 

</row>

**HP** 210

**Divine Aegis** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Trigger** The girtablilu seer attempts a saving throw against a [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) effect but hasn't rolled yet; **Effect** The seer summons divine energy to protect themself at the cost of their other magical defenses. Until the start of their next turn, they gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-[divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) magical effects and a –1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pincer +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 3d8+12 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +24 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d6+12 piercing plus girtablilu venom

**Divine Spontaneous Spells** DC 33
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **1st**
[Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [Purify Food and Drink](/Spells.aspx?ID=241), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Augury](/Spells.aspx?ID=15), [Calm Emotions](/Spells.aspx?ID=31), [Create Food](/Spells.aspx?ID=52) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), [Glyph of Warding](/Spells.aspx?ID=138), [Sanctified Ground](/Spells.aspx?ID=265) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Neutralize Poison](/Spells.aspx?ID=207), [Outcast's Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=211) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146), [Remove Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=250) (3 slots)
- **6th**
[Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) (3 slots)

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  3d8+6 bludgeoning, DC 24

**Desert Stride**   A girtablilu ignores natural difficult terrain in the desert.

**Girtablilu Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 30 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d6 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round); **Stage 3** 3d6 poison damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-239" />
name: Girtablilu Seer
